title: can you tell me will they ever sell cornbeef in the can in the grocery store again? or where i might can find some.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=9598 And a link showing that it has been turning up in Walmart stores in Floriday: http://articles.orlandosentinel.com/2011-05-11/features/os-lostfound-051111-20110511_1_canned-corned-beef-canned-plums-butter-pickles
